DOC.brief_summary: This study open-label extension allow patient complete Protocol MNTX 301 continue receive SC MNTX .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Completion protocol MNTX 301 ; DoubleBlind Treatment OpenLabel Treatment 2 . Negative pregnancy test 1 . Women pregnant and/or nursing 2 . Any concurrent experimental drug therapy 3 . Evidence fecal impaction 4 . Clinically significant active diverticular disease
